content: Create comprehensive backend services for admin dashboard (analytics, resort management, instructor verification, support, emergency, financial, content)
Implement advanced analytics service with real-time metrics and reporting
Create resort management service with capacity planning and operations
Build instructor verification and management system
Implement support ticketing and dispute resolution system
Create emergency management and notification system
Build financial reporting and payout management
Implement content management and moderation system
Create comprehensive admin dashboard frontend with all management interfaces
Add integration capabilities for external resort systems
Implement quality assurance and audit trails
Create remaining backend controllers for all services
Build comprehensive routing and API structure
Enhance frontend components with advanced functionality
Add real-time dashboard updates and notifications
